caption.p: Antioxidant activity of Aloe vera accessions with control by using different assays. a Showing DPPH free radical scavenging activity of Aloe vera and ascorbic acid. b Showing hydrogen peroxide scavenging activity of Aloe vera and ascorbic acid. c Showing reducing power activity of Aloe vera and ascorbic acid. d Showing metal chelating activity of Aloe vera and ascorbic acid. e Showing reductive potential of Aloe vera leaf extracts assayed by β carotene-lenoleic acid assay
